name: nova-logs
description: A bot for logging basic user activity on the Makeshift Discord guild.

scripts.lint: npx prettier --write . && npx eslint . && npx --package=typescript tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:check: npx prettier --check . && npx eslint . && npx --package=typescript tsc --noEmit
scripts.build: npm run lint && npx --package=typescript tsc --build --clean && npx --package=typescript tsc

author: NKN1396
